abstract: Suffolk County police announce discovery of body of Gerson Salmon-Negron of Queens, passenger missing since emergency landing of small plane in Setauket Harbor in February.
lead_paragraph: The body of Gerson Salmon-Negron, 23, of Elmhurst, Queens, was found on a beach, the authorities said.

headline.main: Body Recovered 2 Months After Plane Lands in a Long Island Harbor
headline.print_headline: Plane Rider’s Body Is Found on Beach

snippet: The body of Gerson Salmon-Negron, 23, of Elmhurst, Queens, was found on a beach, the authorities said.
